ctx: intros c s H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable inv.

ctx: intros c s H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat c : Client_index s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) H1 : lb_step_execution lb_step_async s H2 : weak_fairness lb_step_async label_silent s H3 : In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Lock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s))) Unable to unify "In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Lock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s)))" with "eventually (now (occurred (MsgLock c))) s".

original: intros c s H1 H2 H3. apply eventually_trans with (P:=now (occurred (MsgLock c))); auto. apply H3; auto.
